titles: I A. B. do sincerely promise and swear, that I will be faithful, and bear true allegiance to his majesty King William. So help me God
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
notes: Title from opening words of text.
A loyalty oath, as, for example, Public General Acts 1 William and Mary.c.2.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: William --  III, --  King of England, 1650-1702 --  Early works to 1800.
Loyalty oaths --  England --  Early works to 1800.
